channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: A South Carolina man is set to become the first executed by firing squad in 15 years
item.description: A South Carolina man convicted of murder is scheduled to be executed by firing squad Friday night. Brad Sigmon beat to death his ex-girlfriend’s parents with a baseball bat as part of a botched kidnapping plan in 2001.

item.title: Federal judge to hear arguments over whether to block immigration arrests in US schools
Investigation advances into Gene Hackman’s mysterious death, with update by New Mexico authorities
